title: Champion Capsule rewards.
body: Okay so this might not be an issue for  the majority of players but as a person who has been playing since season 2 i feel like the champion capsules are a waste considering i have all champions. As i said most players likely don't have all the champions so it doesn't apply to them but i do think riot should replace the capsules for something else when you own all the champions. In saying this i have no idea what u would replace them with (obviously not going to give you RP) I don't know just something that feels more rewardable. Yeah i get you don't play league for the loot but still. Any suggestions for what riot could do about this would be nice to hear.

replies.body:
Basically the purpose is BE from the shards. For those who own all the champions there is a twice yearly Essence Emporium with plenty of options to spend your hard earned currency on.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014872088-The-Essence-Emporium-FAQ
